```{r}
library(raster)

# Step 1: Load the GeoTIFF file
geotiff <- raster("/home/jed/Desktop/Arbor_Meta/Int_Journal_Wildland_Fire/Take_three/model_outputs_area_tifs/clip_weighted_merged_models_no_als.tif")
plot(geotiff, main = "", col = terrain.colors(100))
summary(geotiff)

shade_sum <- geotiff
res(shade_sum)

# Step 3: Apply the equation to calculate woody_sum
woody_sum <- -0.0005586 + 0.0008133 * shade_sum
plot(woody_sum, main = "", col = terrain.colors(100))
# Step 4: Save the resulting raster as a new GeoTIFF
writeRaster(woody_sum, "/home/jed/Desktop/Arbor_Meta/Int_Journal_Wildland_Fire/Take_three/model_outputs_area_tifs/woody_sum_result_raster.tif", format = "GTiff", overwrite = TRUE)

# Optional: Print the summary of the new raster layer
summary(woody_sum)
```
